actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals a refundable credit for sewer connection expenses required under Federal or State law.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit of 50 percent of required sewer connection expenses. Defines such expenses as any amount paid or incurred to convert a principal residence from use of a septic tank sewage system to use of a municipal sewage system, if such conversion is required by Federal or State law. Limits such credit to $1,500.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals a refundable credit for sewer connection expenses required under Federal or State law.
